definitions.definition: to clean one's mouth by holding water or some other liquid in the back of the mouth and blowing air out from the lungs
to make a sound like the one made while gargling
to clean a specific part of the body by gargling (almost always throat or mouth )
to use (a liquid) for purposes of cleaning one's mouth or throat by gargling.
examples: Every morning he gargled a little cheap Scotch.

definitions.definition: to perform oral sex on (a person or genitals).

main_definition: ( intransitive ) to clean one's mouth by holding water or some other liquid in the back of the mouth and blowing air out from the lungs
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) to make a sound like the one made while gargling
( transitive ) to clean a specific part of the body by gargling (almost always throat or mouth )
( transitive ) to use (a liquid) for purposes of cleaning one's mouth or throat by gargling.
( slang , transitive ) to perform oral sex on (a person or genitals).
